pageTitle: FOMENTO ECONOMICO MEXICA-UBD (FEMSAUBD:Mexico): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5621=Fomento Económico Mexicano, S.A.B. de C.V., through its subsidiaries, operates as a bottler of Coca-Cola trademark beverages and a chain of small-format stores. It produces, markets, sells, and distributes Coca-Cola trademark beverages, including sparkling beverages, such as colas and flavored sparkling beverages; waters; and still beverages comprising juice drinks, coffee, teas, milk, value-added dairy products, and isotonic drinks. The company also operates a chain of small-format stores under the OXXO brand name in Mexico, as well as operates other small-format stores, which include soft discount stores with a focus on perishables and liquor stores. As of December 31, 2013, it operated 12,812 OXXO stores in Mexico and 41 OXXO stores in Colombia. In addition, the company offers various logistics and vehicle maintenance services to clients in the beverages, consumer products, and retail industries in Mexico, Brazil, Colombia, Panama, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, and Peru; and vertical and horizontal commercial refrigerators for the soft drink, beer, and food industries. It has operations in Mexico, Central America, Colombia, Venezuela, Brazil, Argentina, and the Philippines. The company was founded in 1890 and is headquartered in Monterrey, Mexico., 8961=Fomento Económico Mexicano, S.A.B de C.V reported consolidated earnings results for the second quarter and six months ended June 30, 2015. For the quarter, the company reported total revenues of MXN 75,120 million against MXN 70,956 million a year ago. Income from operations was MXN 8,325 million against MXN 7,953 million a year ago. Income before income tax and participation in associate’s results was MXN 6,635 million against MXN 6,048 million a year ago. Net consolidated income was MXN 5,296 million against MXN 4,463 million a year ago. EBITDA was MXN 11,046 million against MXN 11,285 million a year ago. Capex was MXN 3,701 million against MXN 3,951 million a year ago. Net debt was MXN 48.618 billion. For the six months, the company reported total revenues of MXN 140,443 million against MXN 136,463 million a year ago. Income from operations was MXN 14,196 million against MXN 14,050 million a year ago. Income before income tax and participation in associate’s results was MXN 11,001 million against MXN 10,744 million a year ago. Net consolidated income was MXN 9,649 million against MXN 8,326 million a year ago. EBITDA was MXN 19,749 million against MXN 20,193 million a year ago. Capex was MXN 6,963 million against MXN 7,014 million a year ago., 10604=Fomento Económico Mexicano, S.A.B de C.V announced that they will report Q2, 2015 results at 5:00 PM, US Eastern Standard Time on Jul 23, 2015, 11119=Fomento Económico Mexicano, S.A.B de C.V, Q2 2015 Earnings Call, Jul 23, 2015}
